attributes.action: Apply fines / taxes on all products where the packagine exceeds the size of the product by 5% or more
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Apply fines and / or taxes on all products where the packaging exceeds the size of the product by 5% or more, (one example Easter eggs)as a method of both reducing the overall volume of waste and to stop manufacturers coning the consumer (electorate)that the packaging contains more then it does!
Consideration given to lower VAT on products with no packaging

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
